commands.cmd:
if [[ "${workspaceFolder}" == '' ]]; then 
 echo 'Wrong local workspace folder "${workspaceFolder}"!!'
else
 rsync -av --rsync-path=/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/rsync --exclude={'.git','.vscode','.project','.gitignore','.venv','venv','__pycache__','*.json','log/*','*.log'} "${workspaceFolder}/" academy-test:~/ibm-i-deployment/ 
fi

commands.name: $(symbol-property) Clean logs
commands.command: ssh academy-test "source .profile; cd ibm-i-deployment/webapp/log; echo '' > index; echo '' > webapp "
